did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Files of Cornell University's student union include files relating to the creation of the student union, correspondence, financial records, printed material, scrapbooks, guestbooks, and some Straight family correspondence.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Files of Cornell University's student union include files relating to the creation of the student union, correspondence, financial records, printed material, scrapbooks, guest books, and some Straight family correspondence. Also some files regarding the Psi Upsilon fraternity.

Includes a copy of The Journal of the Royal Architectural Institute of Canada, University of Toronto Number, Vol. 2, January-February 1925, No. 1 with photographs of Hart House at the University of Toronto, one of the inspirations for Willard Straight Hall.
Photos of Christmas events and decorations in the Straight ca. 1955.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Willard Straight Hall records, #35-7-503. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
